SummaryEnglish: Mimu Emilton is a cute fourteen-year-old who has come to the annual Starland Festival to become an idol, just like her role model, Yuri. Unfortunately for Mimu, she can never seem to make it to her audition on time. Just as she makes her place on the stage and begins her audition, though, an unknown group of aliens kidnaps her and the Excellent Idols. It is only the beginning of a wild interdimensional goose-chase that places Mimu in the position to save the world, if only she can believe in herself.

1.SummaryEnglish: Mimu Emilton, who is aiming for an audition, is caught up in an accident unfolded by excellent idols and is tattered. However, the moment I finally arrived and tried to sing on the stage, using the "smile", "dignity", and "guts" that the idols taught me, another rare guest came in! "What's going on?"

2.SummaryEnglish: Mimu and the excellent idols have been forcibly taken to the everlasting summer star Bali Howie by a rare guest. It's in the middle of a galaxy-scale idol swimming competition! They were chosen to represent the Earth. A dream that remains dumb, with the people who quickly grasp the situation and sprinkle sales smiles behind. However, suddenly it takes a pinch hitter mission!

3.SummaryEnglish: After the swimming competition, the excellent idols had established their respective positions on the movie stars. Luka is aiming for an award in her costume. Corvette appearing in a sexy commercial. Parupu starring in hero action ... On the other hand, Mimu had a part-time job at a home delivery lunch. However, the dream of the day was the worst fortune ever ...!?

4.SummaryEnglish: One important thing in space! The idol dimension that Yuri was born with was so dyed in Yuri that he began to swallow the entire universe to balance. To save it, the excellent idols organized a concert to show the existence of idols other than Yuri. And there is a golden microphone in my undreamed hand ...!?
